description: Aruruu is Eruruu`s shy, quiet younger sister, and a friend to Yuzuha and Kamyu. Like Eruruu, she is also named after a fictional flower. It is said that the Eruruu and Aruruu flowers grow together. When she first meets Hakuoro, she is shy and recalcitrant, running and hiding from Hakuoro at every opportunity and speaking very little.
name: Aruruu
